basics.name: Javier Carrion
basics.label: Software Quality Assurance / Support Specialist
basics.summary: Detail-oriented professional with experience in the IT industry. Background includes user support, systems installation, repair, maintenance, and technology procurement. A meticulous experienced Manual Software QA tester with a proven record of reporting defects, reducing project time and ability to meet deadlines. Excel at creating test plans and writing/running tests to pinpoint software defects.

work.company: QQ Solutions, Inc. a subsidiary of Vertafore, Inc. - Deerfield Beach, FL
work.position: Software Quality Assurance Analyst / Software Support Specialist
work.summary: Identified, documented and reported bugs, errors, interoperability flaws, and other issues within proprietary insurance software applications developed for QQSolutions’s global user base.
highlights: ●	Worked in Agile Scrum Development Environment with frequently changing requirements and features set.
●	Developed and executed test plans based on business requirements and technical design documents.
●	Preformed manual testing extensively: System and Regression of windows based, and web based applications.
●	Working extensively on testing manually the GUI functionality for Software as a Service (SaaS) Agency Management System (AMS).

work.company: Support.com Inc. - West Palm Beach, FL
work.summary: Remote Services Technician, provided inbound world-class customer service while resolving   complex issues for computer & mobile devices.
highlights: ●	Found creative and sophisticated solutions to problems reported while using internal product suite through analytical & strong troubleshooting abilities.
●	Took ownership of technical issues, and worked with Development group to resolve more advanced issues when necessary.

work.company: Vision Care Holdings, LLC - Lake Worth, FL
work.position: Level II Systems Support Specialist / Field Systems Engineer
work.summary: Researched and resolved issues escalated to Level II, assisting users with troubleshooting of hardware and software, Operating Systems, identifying problems and trends and providing solutions. Provided technical assistance to staff, assisting with network access, printing, and application software operation. Re-imaged laptops and maintained hardware infrastructure.
highlights: ●	Installed, maintained, & upgraded networks for one hundred and thirty-five stores in two companies (Eyeglass World & Lasik Vision Institute) and Corporate Headquarters.
●	Traveled to different parts of the United State to support, upgrade and install Unix/Linux server network system for new & existing stores.
●	Used Numara Track-IT system to reviewed work orders to change, install, repair, and remove equipment.

awards.title: Employee of the Month - Going “above and beyond”
awards.awarder: QQ Solutions, Inc. a subsidiary of Vertafore, Inc.
awards.summary: Recognized for long hours, commitment to customers, attention to detail, professionalism, and follow-up.

awards.title: Employee of the Month
awards.summary: Working after hours, traveling to fix issues and at a moments notice, professionalism, and follow-up.

awards.title: Great Attitude Commendation
awards.summary: Commended for dedicated work ethic and rewarded by steady promotions and training in all aspects of work.
